dc:title: Loaves and Fishes
dc:author: Dorothy Day
dc:description: A chapter from Loaves and Fishes. Describes her meeting Peter Maurin and getting out the first edition of The Catholic Worker. Recalls how Peter's program--roundtable discussions, houses of hospitality, and farm colonies--became the core Catholic Worker program. Extensive quotes from Peter Maurin, including an Easy Essay on utopianism and Christian communism.
